answers.answer: Hi,I have nothing concrete, just what I saw when I typed it into the search engine, all kinds of "hints" that it could increase your blood sugar but nothing concrete.  Mind has now stabalized but I am getting different injections.  I will ask my doctor next week what the substance is called, it is similar to lidocaine, I just can't remember the name right now.  I'll get back to you.Viki

question: In regards to the prior question of Injected Lidocaine (without a steroid addition) causing a transient elevation in blood sugars: do you have and leads or references that I could look at?ThanksThis discussion is related to/posts/show/349549.
title: Lidocaine and blood glucose elevations
